#CODE;ENGLISH;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;: successor_desc;This character is one of the former generals and vassals of the Yunani conqueror of Rajasthan
column2: who died early in his reign.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

#CODE;ENGLISH;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;: purandara_bloodline_desc;A minor king who subjugated the warring states of Southern India and united the chaotic region under one massive empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
laskandar_bloodline_desc;The great yunani conqueror who established a realm stretching from the coast of Yunan to the Indus River.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

gangaraja_bloodline_desc;The greatest ruler of the Sharma dynasty that once dominated north India. His reign is widely regarded as a golden age that brought stability and prosperity to the realm.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
british_invasion_desc;We can wage a war to bring the Indian lands under the Queen's authority;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
##FEUDAL TAMIL, modified versions of titles taken from the Nomina Vera mod, with permission
unite_the_ganges_desc;Reform the ancient empire of the Sharma dynasty
integrate_yunan_desc;The coastal regions of Maharashtra had been conquered by the Yunani of Mumbai centuries ago. However
column2: a strong Maharashtrian raja can bring these regions back into the folds of the kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

#CODE;ENGLISH;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;: form_madhya_pradesh_desc;Unite central India into one kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
expand_mughalstan_desc;It is said that the emperors of ancient Mughalistan ruled a realm stretching from the Indus in the west to Bengal in the east. By controlling these regions
column2: the newly-established empire of Mughalistan can claim sovereignty over these lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

#CODE;ENGLISH;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;: unite_the_ganges_TOOLTIP;Control all counties bordering the Ganges river;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
